text: Prattville is a city in Autauga and Elmore counties in the U.S. state of Alabama. It is the county seat of Autauga County. As of the 2020 Census, the population of the city is 37,781. The city is northwest of Montgomery. ==Tornado== On February 17, 2008, Prattville was hit by an estimated EF3 tornado which destroyed more than 45 homes and businesses and damaged over 800. ==Notable residents== * John Martin, Author Travel and History * Rodger Morrison, Author and Researcher * Marlon Anderson, Major League Baseball player *Evan Crawford, Major League Baseball player * Bobby Jon Drinkard, contestant on Reality television shows Survivor: Palau and Survivor: Guatemala * Roman Harper, NFL player. * Wilson Pickett (March 18, 1941 â€“ January 19, 2006), R&B; and soul singer and songwriter * Kevin Turner, NFL player == References == Category:Cities in Alabama Category:County seats in Alabama
title: Prattville, Alabama
